mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK b JOIN BOOK_HISTORY h ON b.ID = h.BOOK_ID WHERE (b.CREATED_BY = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'WAIT_FOR_RESPONSE') OR (b.CREATED_BY = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'RETURN_REQUEST') OR (h.REQUESTED_USER = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'REJECTED' AND h.IS_CHECKED = false)

SELECT /* historyMapper.selectHistoryByBookId */ h.ID , BOOK_ID , REQUESTED_STATUS , STARTED_AT , ENDED_AT , REQUESTED_USER , REQUESTED_AT FROM BOOK_HISTORY h JOIN BOOK b ON h.BOOK_ID = b.id WHERE (b.CREATED_BY = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'WAIT_FOR_RESPONSE') OR (b.CREATED_BY = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'RETURN_REQUEST') OR (h.REQUESTED_USER = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'REJECTED' AND h.IS_CHECKED = false) ORDER BY REQUESTED_AT DESC
